text: @DrDenaGrayson @williamlegate @realDonaldTrump The whole Fox News bunch carry the same amount of blame as Trump; they all called COVID-19 a ”Democratic hoax” they can't rewrite that there is plenty of videos & tweets proving that. They should just shaddap.
